name: Sandstorm (beta)
description:
Project in progress, stable beta.

Platform: Android/iOs/Web

To move tank use WASD or arrows. Space - change weapon. Tank shoots automatically. To use special weapon - select weapon and click on field, where u want to use weapon. To use airstrike - select airstrike, push down on field and slide airstrike field. In finish point - release mouse button.

4 guns/35 upgrades/8 types of enemy/26 levels

Survival mode is nоt available now.

Feedback please.

hostage-test@ya.ru

https://www.facebook.com/vitaly.hostage

Have a fun!
